page.title: 07FAIR OAK SCHOOL COMPLEX
page.content: The Secondary School admits all the children from Bishopstoke, Horton Heath, Durley and Upham, that is from a radius of 3 miles around the campus. A typical day's programme for a child ; the Junior School would be:- Assembly- Language, Mathematics, some creative work ( either music, craft, gymnastics or games ), a project (that is a special study to include aspects of History, Geography and Science ) and basic French. The size of classes varies somewhat in the Junior School from 28 in Year 4 to 34/37 in other years. Meals are provided for those who require them, cooked in the Infant School kitchen. The majority of children,however, bring sandwiches. In the Secondary School, there is a cafeteria system which is very popular.
